## VRHandGetter type

Get XR controller objects. Use to get the position of the IK hand.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type VRHandGetter = {
    left?: () => THREE.Object3D | undefined;
    right?: () => THREE.Object3D | undefined;
};
```
